[quote=“drachtpkz123, post:14, topic:336253”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=432632.msg3176523#msg3176523 date=1270912620]
I mean WTF.

Ok lets start.

Clan wars has a timer: No timer on this.
Clan wars uses clan chat: No usage of it on this.
Clan wars has to have 1 player on each side at least: Nope.
Clan wars doesnt use capes: This does AND you can glitch and take it off.
Clan wars doesnt have respawning: This does AND its stupid
Clan wars doesnt use commands: this does.
Clan wars IF it used this shitty version would use an array for the deleteitem: this doesnt

The 7 things thats shit about this A) Coder and B) Code
[/quote]

But if you are That "good coder " Fix it then

Dude ur just a fucking noob u make noob servers this is just a base you can easy add things urself but lazy people as you probly cant or are you just a idiot

Omfg Get die or something at least!..[/quote]

item.title: Clanwars Minigame -Beta- With castlewars capes
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123
item.description:
@drachtpkz123 wrote:

I know this has some bugs and the minigame is in process but i will post a new better one if im done with it

If you have castlewars it may be fuck it off :S

The minigame works like this:
There is a red side and a blue side
It is in the elemental dungeon (from the quest)
The task is to kill enemy people and use his cape on the lever or furnace
^^^^^^^ That has a bug cause if you are in the minigame you can type ::teamred or ::teamblue so youll get capes and can use it on the object…
It is funpking you will nbot lose items but i made you only drop capes

This are the featured to now
You cannot logout in minigame (need to add portals Just use castlewars ones)

If you try to teleport it says You cannot teleport out of this minigame! (It loads with absx and absy)

Made it with commands You can simply add them to a portal or on a interface

If server restartarts and ur in minigame U will logout if you login you will stand in edgeville with ur cape in ur invertory

I made it funpk area so you will not lose items

Enemy drops capes

You can use capes on lever or furnace and will get some str exp (after 10 capes You will get a blue or red gloww and will fly :Z)

Made ::teamred ::teamblue (that will give you the capes)

Made ::joinred ::joinblue (that requires the weared cape or you will not go in the minigame)

Added a item interface in the commands

(Comming-Soon)

Add a clanwars point system(uses tokkuls)

Add a clanwars shop with godswords etc

add portals

Fix all buges

Add You cannot attack teammates -.-

add some timers

Add some npcs Fire npcs and water npcs They will attack enemy if wear the cape

You cannot unwear the cape

Remove the commands add them in quest tab (mine’s empty)

This is my first minigame ever made so please dont flame :S:S

Ok lets start!

Add this void in client.java

[QUOTE] void itemMessage(String message, String title, int itemid, int size){
sendFrame200(4883, 591);
sendFrame126(title, 4884);
sendFrame126(message, 4885);
sendFrame246(4883, size, itemid);
sendFrame164(4882);
NpcDialogueSend = true;
}[/QUOTE]

Add this commands

[QUOTE]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“teamred”)){
addItem(4516, 1);
sM(“Type ::joinred to join the Battle(MAKE SURE YOU WEAR THE CAPE!)”);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“joinred”) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516){
toX = 2706;
toY = 9881;
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
deleteItem(4514, 2);
sM(“Fight!”);
itemMessage(“Kill players with Blue cape!”,
“Welcome To ClanWars!”, 4516, 250);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“teamblue”)){
addItem(4514, 1);
sM(“Type ::joinblue to join the Battle(MAKE SURE YOU WEAR THE CAPE!)”);
}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“joinblue”) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514){
toX = 2728;
toY = 9902;
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
deleteItem(4516, 2);
sM(“Fight!”);
itemMessage(“Kill players with Red cape!”,
“Welcome To ClanWars!”, 4514, 250);
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fight”) && playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514){
plrText = “Fight!”;
plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
}[/QUOTE]

Search for boolean isInWilderness(int And replace that boolean with this.

[QUOTE]public boolean inFunPk() {
//if ((absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2745 && absY >= 9865 && absY <= 9910)) {
if(absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2745 && absY >= 9865 && absY <= 9910) {
return true;
} else {
return false;
}
}
public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
if (Type == 1) {
if ((coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715 || (absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2745 && absY >= 9865 && absY <= 9910) && inFunPk()) {
return true;
}
} else if (Type == 2) {
if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
&& (coordX >= 2942) || (absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2745 && absY >= 9865 && absY <= 9910)) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}[/QUOTE]

Search for // Attacking an NPC

You see something like this Could be others But if it has the deathstage = 0 then its good

[QUOTE] // Attacking an NPC
if ((IsAttackingNPC == true) && (deathStage == 0) && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) {[/QUOTE]

Add this into that line

&& !inFunPk()

So mine will look like this:

[QUOTE] // Attacking an NPC
if ((IsAttackingNPC == true) && (deathStage == 0) && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval && !inFunPk()) {[/QUOTE]

above the // Attacking an NPC add this deathstage

[QUOTE]if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !inFunPk()) {
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) {
toX = 2706;
toY = 9881;
dropItem(4516, 1);
sM(“You respawned to the Red Base!”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) {
toX = 2729;
toY = 9904;
dropItem(4514, 1);
sM(“You respawned to the Blue Base!”);
}

		toX = 3094;
		toY = 3499;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		AntiTeleDelay = 0;
		EntangleDelay = 0;
                    resetOtherAtk();
		followID = 0;
		followID2 = 0;
		specialAmount = 100;

}[/QUOTE]

Search for you login message Like Welcome to (name)

Add above the leethax codes and the specattacj();

[QUOTE]if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) {
playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape);
toX = 3096;
toY = 3499;
addItem(4516, 1);
sM(“You Logged out from Clanwars, Ur Red cape is in ur BackPack”);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) {
playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape);
toX = 3096;
toY = 3499;
addItem(4514, 1);
sM(“You Logged out from Clanwars, Ur Blue cape is in ur BackPack”);
}[/QUOTE]

OR!!!

Search for

[QUOTE] if (dots == 4) {
try {
IPPart1 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(0,
start[0]));
IPPart2 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
(start[0] + 1), start[1]));
IPPart3 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
(start[1] + 1), start[2]));
IPPart4 = Integer.parseInt(playerLastConnect.substring(
(start[2] + 1), (start[3])));
} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
}
}
}[/QUOTE]

Under it add

[QUOTE]if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) {
playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape);
toX = 3096;
toY = 3499;
addItem(4516, 1);
sM(“You Logged out from Clanwars, Ur Red cape is in ur BackPack”);
}
if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) {
playerEquipment[playerCape] = -1;
playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 0;
setEquipment(-1, 0,playerCape);
toX = 3096;
toY = 3499;
addItem(4514, 1);
sM(“You Logged out from Clanwars, Ur Blue cape is in ur BackPack”);
}[/QUOTE]

Search for

sM(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!”);

You see something like this:

[QUOTE]if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
sM(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!”);
return;
}[/QUOTE]

Replace that with:
[/QUOTE]if(absX >= 2695 && absX <= 2745 && absY >= 9865 && absY <= 9910) {
sM(“You cannot teleport out of Clanwars use a portal”);
return;
}
if(wildyLevel > 20 && isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1)){
sM(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness!”);
return;
}[/QUOTE]

CLose and save client.java and open clickingmost.java

Search for case 9154

Add this into it:

[QUOTE] if(c.absX >= 2695 && c.absX <= 2745 && c.absY >= 9865 && c.absY <= 9910) {
c.sM(“You cannot logout in this minigame use the portal”);
break;
}[/QUOTE]

Save COmpile Done!

EDIT!!!

Fix for the teammates kill

add this in ur attack voids (must for range, Mage, Mellee) I think Range and mellee are in attack() void

[QUOTE]if ((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516) && (AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4516)) {
sM(“You can’t attack your own team.”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}
if ((playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514) && (AttackingOn2.playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4514)) {
sM(“You can’t attack your own team.”);
ResetAttack();
return false;
}[/QUOTE]
